scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/public && for i in src/*.scss ; do CSS=`echo $i | sed 's/src\///'` ; sass $i:dist/public/$CSS.css ; done && cp -r src/images src/*.js src/*.html dist/public ; cp  server.js dist
